name: Designer's Toolkit
description:
Hey Designers!


We have put together a collection of 40 plus editable documents that Designers from all industries can utilise.


This project was created by Elvis Obi & Andikan Bassey and was made possible by Seven (7) other amazing people (Designers and PMs) who contributed immensely to the success of this project through collaboration:


Areous Ahmad, Rukayat Yaro, Victor Onazi, Josh Ayokhai, Emmanuel Adegbe, Sophia Okolo, and Elizabeth Okaome.



BROUGHT TO OUR NOTICE!


We understand some of you are facing challenges accessing other pages on the file. We advise that you expand the pages section on the left tab of your Figma to see the complete file.


Otherwise, scroll down on the left tab to access other pages. Thank you.


We are also aware that the file was formatted with "Lorem Ipsum" This is to ensure that we do not make decisions for people and allow as much room as possible for edit-ability.


However, we will continue to make efforts towards formatting the documents for best use. Do watch out for future updates.


Please let us know if you face any other challenges.
